20101231233516.000|20101231233518.000|CC1|AFTER THAT HORRIFIC ACCIDENT AT

20101231233521.000|20101231233523.000|CC1|EIGHT PEOPLE DIED WHEN A DRIVER 
20101231233523.000|20101231233525.000|CC1|LOST CONTROL AND PLOWED INTO    
20101231233525.000|20101231233526.000|CC1|THE CROWD.

20101231233534.000|20101231233539.000|CC1|REMOVE -- IN THE REMOTE MOJAVE

20101231233540.000|20101231233542.000|CC1|HAS GONE HORRIBLY WRONG AND TRY

20101231233550.000|20101231233551.000|CC1|BLOODIED AND SCREAMING.

20101231233612.000|20101231233612.000|CC1|ROCKS.
